body:
so this (gcc-s390x-linux-gnu) is unfortunately only in
stretch/sid/experimental
https://packages.debian.org/search?keywords=gcc-s390x-linux-gnu

On Wed, Jul 20, 2016 at 10:51 AM, Brad Fitzpatrick <notifications@github.com
> wrote:

> This bug is about
>
> 1) how to cross-compile s390x release binaries for x/build/cmd/release
> 2) hosting said binaries on golang.org/dl (but only after we've figured
> out (1)
>
> @jfrazelle <https://github.com/jfrazelle> had mentioned
> CC=gcc-5-s390x-linux-gnu. There a Debian package for that? We want to be
> able to build s390x binaries on linux-amd64. (All other release builds are
> built + tested on either native hardware or VMs, but we'll have to stop at
> just make.bash for s390x).
>
> As for (2), we briefly discussed having a section or column to denote
> which builds are at which support status. Let's defer that discussion until
> we have (1) figured out.
>
> /cc @billotosyr <https://github.com/billotosyr>, @adg
> <https://github.com/adg>, @broady <https://github.com/broady>
>
> â€”
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
